name: N'House
address: House 2, 4th Floor, Alley 810, De La Thanh, Ba Dinh District, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated 400 metres from Vincom Center Nguyen Chi Thanh in Hanoi, this apartment features a terrace. The unit is 700 metres from Giang Vo Exhibition Center. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

Hanoi Temple of Literature is 2.3 km from N'House, while Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 21 km from the property.
